### 5/16 - May SoCalRUG Meetup 

[Luke Morris, MSBA, MHDS](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lukesmorris/) will be presenting his research and work titled _*Beyond the Symptoms: How one Emergency Department is reducing overutilization by broadening homelessness services*_.

We will be posting this event soon to our Meetup and if you have any recommendations on local speakers or presenters, or want to learn about a specific topic, please let us know!

# Intro to {sherlock}: an R Package for Problem Diagnosis

#### Speaker: **Gabor Szabo**
[Gabor Szabo](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gaboraszabo/) is a Sr. Principal Engineer at Edwards Lifesciences where he plays an integral part in developing enterprise-wide strategy for validating automated manufacturing processes, and developing solutions that enhance product quality and reliability.

Gabor analyzes and visualizes data using R, Power BI, and Excel, he has led R programming and data analytics trainings to Edwards Lifesciences employees, and he develops data products using R Shiny for analysis and simulation purposes.
